summary: This bill, the "Office of Management and Budget Inspector General Act," aims to establish an Inspector General within the Office of Management and Budget (OMB). It amends Title 5 of the United States Code related to the Office of Inspector General to include the OMB. The bill outlines the Inspector General's jurisdiction and mandates the President to appoint an individual to this position within 120 days of the bill's enactment. The bill's central goal is to enhance oversight and accountability of the OMB.
